title: Single Game Ticket Header
custom_preconds:
Given
User is on the https://www.mlb.com/phillies/tickets/single-game-tickets page
User is trying to purchase a single game ticket for a Phillies game
custom_steps:
When
Verify that the page header displays the text "Phillies Single Game Tickets"
Check that header font is consistent with the rest of the Page
Check that the header color is consistent with the Phillies Team color
Verify that the header is prominently displayed at the top of the page
Check that the header is clickable link that redirects the user to the single game ticket purchasing page
Verify that the header is responsive and adjusts its size and layout on different screen sizes.
custom_expected:
Then
The header should accurately and clearly display text "Phillies Single Game Tickets"
The header should be consistent with the page overall's design and brand
The header should be prominently displayed at the top of the page and be clickable link that redirects the user to the single fame ticket purchasing page.
The header should be responsive and adjusts its size and layout on different screen sizes without affecting the functionality of the page

title: Single Game Tickets-Main Header
custom_preconds:
Given
User is on the https://www.mlb.com/dodgers/tickets/single-game-tickets page
User is trying to purchase a single game ticket for a Dodgers game
custom_steps:
When
Verify that the page header displays the text "Single Game Tickets"
Check that header font is consistent with the rest of the Page
Check that the header color is consistent with the Dodgers Team color
Verify that the header is prominently displayed at the top of the page
Verify that the header is responsive and adjusts its size and layout on different screen sizes.
custom_expected:
Then
The header should accurately and clearly display text "Single Game Tickets"
The header should be consistent with the page overall's design and brand
The header should be responsive and adjusts its size and layout on different screen sizes without affecting the functionality of the page

title: Verify Day/Month/Date present on the far left of the event card
custom_steps:
WHEN
User is on the single game ticket page,
Verify that the Month/Date is present on the far left of the event card.
Verify that the Month/Date is displayed corresponding to the Month/Date selected in the calendar.
Verify the Text in each event card for Month/Date
custom_expected:
THEN
The Month/Date is present in the far left of the event card.
All event cards display the same Month/Date selected on the calendar.
All event cards display consistent Month/Date text

title: Verify Opponent with logo in the middle of the event Card.
custom_steps:
WHEN
User selects an opponent from the drop-down opponent filter header.
Verify that the selected opponent Name w/logo is displayed on the event card.
Verify that  only one opponent Name w/logo appears on the event card when selecting multiple opponents from the opponent filter head.
custom_expected:
THEN
The Opponent's logo should be displayed on the page when the corresponding opponent is selected from the the opponent filter drop down

title: Verify the Home Venue Display in the far right of the Event Card
custom_steps:
WHEN
User lands on the home Team page
Verify that the Home Venue for the home team is displayed on the far right on top of the local time zone.
custom_expected:
THEN
The Home Venue is displayed on the far right of the event card above the local time zone

title: Verify that local time zone is displayed on the Event card to the far right
custom_steps:
THEN
Verify that the local time zone for the home venue is displayed on the far right of the event Card.
custom_expected:
THEN
Local time zone is displayed on the far right of the event card for the Home Venue.

title: Verify visiter/home circle logos lockup
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User lands
https://web-apps-x-homepage-1026.webeng-gcp-npd.mlbinfra.net/phillies/tickets/zzztest/zzzsinglegame?pathOverrides=server:development (this link will soon need to be changed)
custom_steps:
WHEN
1. Select an opponent from the drop-down
2. Verify that the selected opponent logo appears on the event card next to the home logo. 
3. Select date from the calendar
4. Verify that the selected opponent logo and the home team logo appear on the page
custom_expected:
THEN
1. The Opponent should be selected from the drop-down.
2. The selected opponent logo should display next to the home team logo
3. Date selected from calendar corresponds to game date, which appears for each game.
3. Both the selected opponent logo and the home logo should be displayed on the event card

title: Verify "Single Game Ticket" text is displayed next to the Opponent logo
custom_steps:
WHEN
Verify that "Single Game Ticket" text is displayed next to the circle logo in the event card.
custom_expected:
THEN
" The text "Single Game Ticket" is displayed with consistency text next to the circle logo in each event.

title: Verify Lowest price configuration
custom_steps:
WHEN
Verify that the lowest price text indicates the starting price next to the Buy Ticket Button in the Event Card.
custom_expected:
THEN
The lowest price text shows the current game's lowest price at that venue next to the But Ticket button in the event Card.

title: Verify "Buy Tickets button" clickable/present on the far right of the Event Card
custom_steps:
WHEN
Verify that the "Buy Button" should be visible and located to the far right in the event card.
Verify that the Buy Button is responsive to clicks
Verify that the Buy Button triggers the next step in Buying Ticket process.
custom_expected:
THEN
"Buy Button" is visible and located on the far right in the event card
"Buy Button" is responsive to clicks
"Buy Button" triggers the next step in the Buying ticket process.

title: Verify when the Calendar Header is clicked, the "Calendar" Picker should appear
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User lands 
https://web-apps-x-homepage-1026.webeng-gcp-npd.mlbinfra.net/phillies/tickets/zzztest/zzzsinglegame?pathOverrides=server:development (this link will soon needs to be change)
custom_steps:
WHEN
On the Single Game Ticketing page, the User clicks on the Monthly calendar header.
Verify that the applicable game date in the Calendar is clickable 
User clicks on the corresponding day of the game on the calendar
User shuffles through months by clicking back and forth on the arrows
custom_expected:
THEN
The Monthly view of the calendar will be displayed with selected Month.
The date for the corresponding game is clickable.
On the corresponding dates, any Schedule event for the selected month will be displayed.
Clicking on the arrows should allow the user to navigate to the previous or next month.

title: Verify the functionality of the Month filter Header
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User lands
https://web-apps-x-homepage-1026.webeng-gcp-npd.mlbinfra.net/phillies/tickets/zzztest/zzzsinglegame?pathOverrides=server:development (this link will soon need to be changed)
custom_steps:
WHEN
User clicks on the month filter header.
User selects more than one month from the dropdown.
User hover over different months.
User un-selects the selected month.
custom_expected:
THEN
The month filter should display the event month in a drop-down menu
User has the option of selecting more than one month
When hovering over, the user can see that a month can be selected
Selecting/unselecting the month can be done from the drop-down menu

title: Verify the functionality of the Day filter Header
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User lands
https://web-apps-x-homepage-1026.webeng-gcp-npd.mlbinfra.net/phillies/tickets/zzztest/zzzsinglegame?pathOverrides=server:development (this link will soon need to be changed)
custom_steps:
WHEN
User clicks on the Day filter header
User select/un-select multiple days at a time drop-down
User hovers over the days of the week from the drop-down
custom_expected:
THEN
User can select/un-select multiple days at a time from the drop-down
The event for the selected day appears on the page based on the day selection.
The drop-down menu can be hovered over to see the days of the week

title: Verify the functionality of the Time filter Header
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User lands
https://web-apps-x-homepage-1026.webeng-gcp-npd.mlbinfra.net/phillies/tickets/zzztest/zzzsinglegame?pathOverrides=server:development (this link will soon need to be changed)
custom_steps:
WHEN
User clicks on the Time filter header
User selects/un-select Day/Night from the drop-down
User hovers over the Day/Night
custom_expected:
THEN
User can select/unselect options from the Day/Night drop-down box
The event for the selected Day/Night appears on the page based on the selection.
Hovering over the drop-down menu will reveal the Day/Night time.

title: Verify the functionality of the Opponent filter Header
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User lands
https://web-apps-x-homepage-1026.webeng-gcp-npd.mlbinfra.net/phillies/tickets/zzztest/zzzsinglegame?pathOverrides=server:development (this link will soon need to be changed)
custom_steps:
WHEN
User clicks on the Opponent filter header
User selects/un-select Opponent from the drop-down
Verify that the Opponent's logo is displayed on the page with the corresponding game day/date.
Verify that the Opponent's logo is no longer displayed on the page when un-selected.
Verify the Opponent filter header should have an x option to de-select all opponents when multiple opponents are selected.
User scrolls down to the drop-down and hovers over the Opponents
custom_expected:
THEN
User can select/un-select Opponents from the drop-down
The Opponent's logo is displayed on the page with corresponding date and day of the game
The Opponent's logo is no longer displayed on the page
User can clear the multiple selected Opponent's with x option in the filter header
User is able to hover over the Opponent.

title: Verify the functionality of the Hide Offers toggle
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User lands
https://web-apps-x-homepage-1026.webeng-gcp-npd.mlbinfra.net/phillies/tickets/zzztest/zzzsinglegame?pathOverrides=server:development (this link will soon need to be changed)
custom_steps:
WHEN
Verify that Hide Offers toggle switch is on and off position
User clicks on the Hide Offers toggle, the promotions displays under the corresponding team
custom_expected:
THEN
The hide offer switch is in the on on/off position.
When the toggle is in the on position, the user can see the displayed promotions for the corresponding team.
